channel.title: Dreams on BlackPirateX
channel.description: Recent content in Dreams on BlackPirateX

item.description: Im having the dreams again. My teacher is a communist and somehow leaked to a stranger that he is communist. There was a trick to calculate distance of something by using a very small amount of sand. You have to use an arrow and throw it so it touches only the top of the sand. I was begging the guy not tp harm my teacher. I have no idea if he was on side of us or against us.
